docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers said rates of problems like obesity and asthma doubled in the past 12 years, but many conditions resolved themselves during childhood.

headline.seo: Study Finds Sharp Increase in Chronic Health Problems in Children
headline.main: Children: Rate of Chronic Health Problems Rises
headline.print_headline: CHILDREN: Rate of Chronic Health Problems Rises

docs.snippet: Researchers said rates of problems like obesity and asthma doubled in the past 12 years, but many conditions resolved themselves during childhood.
